law.catch_line: Inclusion of life-cycle energy cost analyses in bids or plans to construct or renovate state-owned buildings.
law.text: The cabinet shall require persons submitting bids or plans for state-owned buildings to be constructed or substantially renovated after July 15, 1996, to include within those bids or plans life-cycle energy cost analyses. The cabinet shall consider those life-cycle cost analyses when evaluating competing bids or plans.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 7, effective February 25, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 7, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1996.

metadata.lrc-note: (2/25/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 28, provides that the repeal and reenactment of this section in that Act "shall apply retroactively to July 15, 2008."
